H0.text: Who aged 65 became the oldest Britain to climb Mount Everest, as at 2009. Chris Bonington

H1.text: Who aged 65 became the oldest Britain to climb Mount Everest, as at 2009. Doug Scott

H2.text: Who aged 65 became the oldest Britain to climb Mount Everest, as at 2009. Stephen Venables

H3.text: Who aged 65 became the oldest Britain to climb Mount Everest, as at 2009. Ran Fiennes

A4.text: Stephen Venables was born on 2 May 1954.

A5.text: After several cancer-free years, he developed a brain tumour and died, aged twelve years old.

A6.text: On 20 May 2009 Fiennes reached the summit of Mount Everest, becoming the oldest British person to achieve this.

A7.text: In May 2009, at the age of 65, he reached the summit of Mount Everest.
